FIFA 20: the notes of Real Madrid players




Real Madrid could in the event of success widen the gap with his pursuers, but also dream of a place of leadership. Despite a complicated start to the season, the club's capital is only one point behind leader Bar√ßa, but remains within range of Atl√©tico Madrid, Sevilla FC and Granada, all one point behind. This Saturday against Real Betis, it is important to confirm after a nice win this week.




There should be some change this weekend in the composition of Zinedine Zidane. In defense, Militao and Mendy are approached to replace Varane and Marcelo, while Modric returns to the midfield instead of Casemiro, dragging Valverde sentinel.
In front, given the success this week against Levante, Rodrygo should again compose the Madrid attack with Benzema and Hazard.
